snippet.title: IVE - After LIKE (Areia Remix)
snippet.description:
Thank you for watching!
My name is Jun Areia and I'm an artist developer and producer based in Seoul, South Korea.
Through Areia Remix, I attempt to offer re-imagined versions of your favorite K-pop songs.
Since 2009, Areia Creations has introduced Korean music to diverse audiences worldwide, helping to promote K-pop and the Korean wave internationally.
This remix is not a commercial release and is created for promotional and entertainment purposes only; all revenue is automatically received by the original artists.
The music in this remix is 100% original and was produced exclusively for this remix from scratch. Only the vocals are used from the original song.

⭐ Support my work:
If you enjoy my work, consider supporting me on Patreon for exclusive benefits! http://www.patreon.com/areiacreations
Or you can just buy me a coffee! https://www.buymeacoffee.com/areiacreations
Your support helps me grow my efforts in producing original K-pop artists and building my company in Korea!
Don't forget to like and comment under this video and subscribe for more K-pop remixes!

⭐ Join my other channels:
(KPOP Reactions & Reviews) https://www.youtube.com/@kpopnerdshow
(Filmmaking) http://www.youtube.com/areiamedia
Also find me on Instagram @areiacreations

⭐ Original K-pop songs and official remixes that I created in direct collaboration with the artists:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4984ECBE290CDCB7&si=E9Du0qjwhKD17QNC

⭐ K-pop Music Videos I've produced and / or directed:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4gi4Gw3hd6XcFY7xFfCApRuo5Jt58wc_&si=kEc5AY8U525MdV0p
